thread.title: PaymentVision to Exhibit at NARCA's Upcoming Fall 2015 Conference
thread.title_full: PaymentVision to Exhibit at NARCA's Upcoming Fall 2015 Conference

author: Eugene O'Rourke
title: PaymentVision to Exhibit at NARCA's Upcoming Fall 2015 Conference
text:
PaymentVision , a leading provider of PCI-compliant electronic payment gateway services, announced today that the company will be an exhibitor at the NARCA 2015 Fall Collection Conference. The event takes place October 14-17 at the Marriott Marquis Washington in Washington, DC. The National Association of Retail Collection Attorneys, also known as NARCA, is dedicated to serving law firms representing clients in matters relating to legal debt collection. Attendees of the Fall Collection Conference will have access to a number of quality education sessions with industry experts, ample networking opportunities, and time to connect with exhibitors.
“Our solutions are specialized for a number of industries, including collections and receivables,” said Eugene O’Rourke, Vice President of Marketing. “For years, our tools have allowed our clients to accept all forms of payment – including credit card and ACH – in a simple and efficient manner. Additionally, clients can take advantage of our convenience fee solution, letting them offset transaction processing costs when payments are made through convenient, self-serve channels.”
For more than 25 years, PaymentVision has been dedicated to providing clients across many industries access to a number of reliable payment processing tools. PaymentVision’s suite of tools provide the ability to accept all forms of payment online and in person.
To learn more about PaymentVision’s integrated electronic payment solutions and to enter our giveaway of two Pebble Steel smartwatches, visit us at booth #5 during the conference.
About PaymentVision
PaymentVision is a biller-direct, PCI-compliant, electronic payment gateway provider. PaymentVision offers clients the unified ability to accept ACH, check, and credit or debit card payments, by phone, or through Internet channels. PaymentVision solutions handle billions of dollars for thousands of financial institutions, large and small, nationwide, including credit unions, banks, consumer finance, and collection agencies. For more information, please visit http://www.paymentvision.com ; follow PaymentVision on Twitter @PaymentVision or on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/paymentvision ; or call 800-345-7243.
About Autoscribe Corporation
Autoscribe Corporation is a leading financial services company and payment processor. With more than two decades of innovation and leadership in the financial technology industry, Autoscribe offers a full suite of tools through PaymentVision and Lyons Commercial Data to help their customers grow their business, simplify payment processing, mitigate risk, and ensure compliance. Recently named to the Inc. 5000 as one of the fastest growing private companies in the nation, Autoscribe has thousands of customers and processes more than $1 billion in transactions annually. For more information, please visit http://www.autoscribe.com ; follow Autoscribe on Twitter @AutoscribeCorp or on LinkedIn at http://www.linkedin.com/company/autoscribe ; or call 800-345-7243.
